message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.CL. 

The paper discusses a meta-learning algorithm for continual lifelong learning, which involves deep neural networks and neuromodulatory processes inspired by the brain. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper involves neural networks (cs.NE), which are commonly used in deep learning, and deals with image classification tasks (cs.CV), which is a common application of deep learning. Finally, the paper also mentions natural language processing (cs.CL) as a potential application of the proposed algorithm.
